item.title: Creating a full workflow
item.description: Action Workflow # We are going to create two workflows in this tutorial. The first one will be an action workflow that will handle actions that result from registered messages. Lets start by clicking on the Admin menu on the left side. This will unfold the Admin menu. Next click on the Workflows link to go to the overview of the workflows. Next click the New Workflow button to initiate a new workflow creation.
